hero.title: Welcome to
hero.description: At La Fabrique du Bonheur, we believe that the body is a powerful gateway to emotional, physical, and mental well-being. We know it is possible to feel better through movement, breath, and creative expression.

about.title: Your Journey to
about.description: At our studio, we believe yoga is more than just physical exerciseâ€”it's a path to discovering your authentic self and finding peace in the present moment.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We offer a unique, holistic approach to embodiment that includes yoga, pranayama (breathwork), meditation, dance, art therapy, and other creative practices weâ€™re excited to explore with you.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: La Fabrique du Bonheur was born out of a deep reflection on the lack of creative community spaces in our town. For us, creativity starts in the body. Everything begins there. A body that embraces movement can think more clearly, create more freely, and engage more openly. As your body transforms, so does your mind

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: The guiding principles that shape every class, every breath, and every moment of transformation.

mindfulness.title: Mindfulness
mindfulness.description: Cultivate present-moment awareness through guided meditation and breathing techniques.

community.title: Community
community.description: Join a supportive community of like-minded individuals on their wellness journey.

wellness.title: Wellness
wellness.description: Achieve holistic health through the perfect balance of physical and mental practices.

growth.title: Growth
growth.description: Embrace continuous personal development and spiritual awakening in every session.

classes.title: This Monthâ€™s
classes.description: From gentle beginnings to advanced flows, find the workshop that resonates with your journey and current needs.

hatha.title: Hatha Yoga
hatha.description: Perfect for beginners, focusing on basic postures and breathing techniques to build foundation and flexibility.

vinyasa.title: Vinyasa Flow
vinyasa.description: Dynamic sequences that synchronize breath with movement, creating a meditative flow of energy and strength.

yin.title: Yin Yoga
yin.description: Slow-paced practice with longer holds, promoting deep relaxation and inner stillness for mind and body.

instructors.title: Meet
instructors.description: Our experienced founders are here to support you on every step of your journey with wisdom, compassion, and expertise.

cta.title: Ready to Begin Your Journey?
cta.description: Our teachers are here to guide you with personalized attention and genuine care for your growth.

sarah.name: Sarah Chen
sarah.title: Lead Instructor & Founder
sarah.bio: Sarah discovered yoga during a transformative journey in India and has been sharing its healing power ever since.

marcus.name: Marcus Rodriguez
marcus.title: Senior Instructor
marcus.bio: Marcus brings a grounded approach to yoga, emphasizing alignment and the deeper philosophical teachings.

luna.name: Luna Patel
luna.title: Wellness Coach
luna.bio: Luna specializes in creating safe, nurturing spaces for healing and personal growth through gentle practices.

instructorDetail.upcomingClassesDescription: Join {instructorName} for their next inspiring sessions.

pricing.title: Choose Your
pricing.description: Simple, transparent pricing for your wellness journey. No hidden fees, just pure transformation.

trial.name: Trial Session
trial.description: Perfect for discovering our workshops and community

pack5.name: 5 Sessions Pack
pack5.description: Great starter pack for regular practice

unlimited.name: 3-Month Unlimited
unlimited.description: Complete immersion in your wellness journey

menuDownload.title: Fresh and seasonal
menuDownload.description: We offer a unique experience that combines coffee shop, movement, and creativity.

testimonials.title: Stories of
testimonials.description: Hear from our community members about their journey of growth, healing, and self-discovery.

emma.name: Emma Thompson
emma.content: This studio has completely transformed my relationship with stress and anxiety. The instructors create such a safe, welcoming space for growth.

david.name: David Kim
david.content: As someone who sits at a desk all day, yoga here has been a game-changer for my posture, flexibility, and mental clarity. Highly recommend!

maria.name: Maria Santos
maria.content: The prenatal classes helped me stay connected to my body during pregnancy. Luna is an incredible instructor with such gentle wisdom.

contact.title: Connect With
contact.description: Have questions about our classes or want to start your journey? We're here to guide you every step of the way.

form.title: Send us a message
form.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you and help you begin your wellness journey.
